input.name: Port
input.narrative: The port number on which the resource PC should listen

input.name: SSO
input.narrative: True to login using Active Directory authentication. If this is False and Username is empty, a public resource PC is started

input.name: Username
input.narrative: The username to use for the resource PC. Ignored if SSO is True. If this is empty and SSO is False, this will create a public resource

input.name: Password
input.narrative: The password to use for the resource. Only used if Username is given

output.name: Process ID
output.narrative: The PID of the newly created process

exception.detail: "You shouldn't be able to start 4 resource PCs"

input.name: Port
input.narrative: The port number whose resource should be stopped

input.name: Port
input.narrative: The port number whose resource should be stopped

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: License Name
input.narrative: The name of your license you wish to add.

input.name: File Path
input.narrative: The file path of your license. Eg. "C:\QA\Licenses"

input.name: License Name
input.narrative: The name of your license you wish to add.

input.name: File Path
input.narrative: The file path of your license. Eg. "C:\QA\Licenses"

input.name: License Owner Name
input.narrative: The owner name of the license you wish to delete

input.name: License Name
input.narrative: The name of your license you wish to add.

input.name: File Path
input.narrative: The file path of your license. Eg. "C:\QA\Licenses"

input.name: License Owner Name
input.narrative: The owner name of the license you wish to delete

input.name: License Owner Name
input.narrative: The owner name of the license you wish to delete

input.name: Open On Creation?
input.narrative: Do you want the process to open on create? This will default to yes.

input.name: Group To Select
input.narrative: Group the process will be contained within

input.name: Name
input.narrative: The name of the process to publish

input.name: Process Name
input.narrative: The name of the process you want to delete.

input.name: Deletion Reason
input.narrative: The reason you wish to delete the process.

input.name: Group to Expand
input.narrative: Group containing the process

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Port
input.narrative: The port number whose resource should be stopped

output.name: Maximum Published Processes
output.narrative: This is the maximum number of processes that can be published using the current license(s). Please note, if unlimited this output will be a string with a value of "Unlimited".

output.name: Maximum Concurrent Sessions
output.narrative: This is the maximum number of concurrent sessions that can be loaded using the current license(s). Please note, if unlimited this output will be a string with a value of "Unlimited".

output.name: Maximum Runtime Resource
output.narrative: This is the maximum number of resources that can be in the database when using the current license(s). Please note, if unlimited this output will be a string with a value of "Unlimited".

output.name: Maximum Process Alerts
output.narrative: This is the maximum number of process alert machines that can be loaded using the current license(s). Please note, if unlimited this output will be a string with a value of "Unlimited".

input.name: Process Name
input.narrative: The name of the process of interest - if it is not found, the 'Ungrouped Processes' group will be opened and checked

input.name: Resource Name
input.narrative: The name of the Resource PC on which to create the session

input.name: Group to Expand
input.narrative: Default value is 'Default'.

input.name: Negative Test
input.narrative: Check for negative testing

input.name: Resource Group to Expand
input.narrative: Default value is 'Default'

output.name: Position of Pending Session
output.narrative: The 1-based index of the newly created session in the Environment list in Control Room

input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Session Position
input.narrative: The 1-based index of the session of interest, in the Environment list

input.name: Process Name
input.narrative: The expected process name of the session of interest. This will be double checked before deleting the session at the specified position.

input.name: Resource Name
input.narrative: The expected resource name of the pending session of interset. This will be double checked before deleting the session

input.name: Session Status
input.narrative: The expected status of the session. This will be double checked - the default value is 'Pending'

input.name: Session Status

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.
